techmeme.title: Sources: Fidelity Investments is in the advanced stages of testing its own stablecoin, managed by its digital assets arm, as Trump pledges to back stablecoins (Philip Stafford/Financial Times)
Microsoft unveils AI deep reasoning agents for 365 Copilot: Researcher, based on OpenAI's deep research model, and o3-mini-based Analyst, rolling out in April (Richard Lawler/The Verge)
Sources: the EU's Huawei corruption probe is looking at alleged gifts like soccer tickets exchanged for political favors; one detainee was a Huawei lobbyist (Laura Dubois/Financial Times)
Databricks details Test-time Adaptive Optimization, or TAO, a new approach to boost LLM performance without requiring labeled data, available now to customers (Will Knight/Wired)
The US adds export restrictions to 80 entities, primarily targeting Chinese companies, including server maker Nettrix and customers of Nvidia, Intel, and AMD (Ana Swanson/New York Times)
